For your information, JP, Minime didn't have to do that to get out of 
the RPG. He had left a while ago, with a perfectly normal reason.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
> Please! Do you expect us to believe that BS? It was just a quick 
and easy way 
> to get out of the RPG. And pills? PILLS? Yeah, right. Im sure thats 
what did 
> it. I dont believe it for a minute. 
> -jp
